help_message_discord:
ğŸ“– **Available commands:**
/chatty âœ Chat with Coffy (supports attachments)
/chatty-wiki âœ Search Wikipedia
/chatty-meteo âœ Show weather for a city
/chatty-tts âœ Generate audio from text
/chatty-info âœ Show bot info
/chatty-help âœ Show this help message

admin_help_message_discord:
ğŸ“– **Admin Dashboard Commands (DM Only)**
/chatty-admin-model âœ Change active Gemini model
/chatty-admin-models âœ List all available models
/chatty-admin-context âœ Set context file for this server
/chatty-admin-context-reset âœ Reset context for this server
/chatty-admin-contexts âœ List available context files
/chatty-admin-stats âœ Show bot statistics
/chatty-admin-activity âœ Show daily activity (last 7 days)
/chatty-admin-lastlogs âœ Show last 10 conversations
/chatty-admin-help âœ Show this help message
